attributes.action: not give Speaker Michael Martin any honnors whatsoever.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a petition to the Prime Minister not to make Michael Martin a Lord, a Sir or provide him with a £100,000+ payoff when he goes.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
